channel.title: Posts on Mike Treglia
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Mike Treglia

item.title: Time for Webpage Makeover Testing
item.description: Time for a Change I got my original website started in the beginning of grad school (circa 2007), with great help from a college friend. As this one, it was a static webpage, but relied directly CSS and HTML, with no real page generator in the sense of Jekyll or Hugo. It’s been great for me - serving as a place to link other projects I’ve developed; for example, a QGIS tutorial I wrote for a workshop, and materials from a GIS/Spatial Analysis course I taught as a postdoc.
